bill_title: provide for the regulation of registered pharmacy technicians.

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to provide for the regulation of registered pharmacy technicians. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. That chapter 36-11 be amended by adding thereto a NEW SECTION to read as follows: No person may practice as a pharmacy technician unless the person is registered by the board. A violation of this section is a Class 2 misdemeanor. Section 2. That § 36-11-2 be amended by adding thereto a NEW SUBDIVISION to read as follows: "Registered pharmacy technician," a person registered by the board who is employed by a pharmacy to assist licensed pharmacists in the practice of pharmacy by performing specific tasks delegated by and under the immediate personal supervision and control of a licensed pharmacist, as permitted by rules promulgated by the board pursuant to chapter 1-26. Section 3. That chapter 3-11 be amended by adding thereto a NEW SECTION to read as follows: The board may promulgate rules pursuant to chapter 1-26 to regulate pharmacy technicians. The rules shall provide for the registration of a pharmacy technician, the suspension or revocation of the registration of a pharmacy technician, an annual registration fee not to exceed fifty dollars, and the tasks that may not be delegated by a licensed pharmacist to a registered technician.
